li.The minor is not open to sociology major: The minor is not open to sociology majors.

courseSection0.text: The minor is not open to sociology majors.

li.Students are expected to have a minimum: Students are expected to have a minimum GPA of 2.0 in courses use for the minor.
li.At least 12 hours used in the minor must: At least 12 hours used in the minor must be earned at UCF within the Sociology Department.
li.Students must satisfy each course's prer: Students must satisfy each course's prerequisites before enrolling in the class.

courseSection0.text:
Minor Requirements
Students are expected to have a minimum GPA of 2.0 in courses use for the minor.
At least 12 hours used in the minor must be earned at UCF within the Sociology Department.
Prerequisite Courses
Students must satisfy each course's prerequisites before enrolling in the class.

courseSection1.text0:
Earn at least 3 credits from the following types of courses: 
2000-4000 level sociology courses
